definition: variant of 擔憂|担忧[dan1 you1]
variant of 耽[dan1]
to indulge in/to delay
to worry/to concern oneself with/worried/anxiety/sorrow/(literary) to observe mourning
to fret over the worries of long-departed people (idiom); to worry unnecessarily/crying over spilt milk/often used with negatives, e.g. no need to worry about past issues

sentences.english: Women face discrimination plus the fear of modesty violation in delhi.
sentences.chinese: 在德里妇女要面对歧视，外加被冒犯的耽忧。

apprehension/apprehensive
concerned/worried/disturbed/anxious

to scorch/to burn to charcoal/sick with worry
to be afraid/to be frightened
misgivings
man of Qǐ fears the sky falling (idiom); groundless fears

to worry about
for fear that/lest/also written 唯恐
to calculate (using bamboo tokens on a counting board)/to count beads/fig. to budget/to plan (an investment)
a disgrace/ashamed
to feel gratitude mixed with shame
feel ashamed
